Title: Enemy Engineering
Description: It may be a bit controversial, but I believe that we can study the rituals of the Primalists to learn new ways to channel elemental power. I'm confident that once we understand the pathways of their magic, we can use it to create all sorts of innovative engineering products.
ObjectivesText: Gather 10 Primal Rituals from the Primalists of the Dragon Isles for Gnoklin Quirkcoil of the Dragonscale Expedition.
RewardText: I've been told that the Primalists reject civilization and seek to bring about its downfall. Ha! The joke is on them. Their rituals will inspire dozens of new gizmos that will bring about the next technological golden age.
